text:
@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Hey Donald,

Have you fully supplied U.S. state’s’ needs for ventilators, yet ?  I would implore your administration’s director of supply for our own COVID-19  response to do so BEFORE you take on the responsibility of supplying a foreign nation.  JFConaCracker !
